LanguageData.Haul.label: haul
LanguageData.Haul.description: The animal will randomly haul items from time to time (though it can't be directed to haul specific items).
LanguageData.Obedience.label: guard
LanguageData.Obedience.description: The animal can be assigned a master whom it will follow and defend.
LanguageData.Release.label: attack
LanguageData.Release.description: The animal can be released to attack distant targets instead of just guarding its master.
LanguageData.Rescue.label: rescue
LanguageData.Rescue.description: The animal will rescue wounded allies and drag them to safety.
LanguageData.Tameness.label: tameness
LanguageData.Tameness.description: The animal can learn to consider itself a member of your colony.
